attributes.action:
MOVE THE UEFA EURO 2016 TO "BRITAIN" ! 
AS MAINLAND EUROPE IS TOO DANGEROUS !
attributes.background:
DUE TO RECENT TERRORIST ATTACKS ON MAINLAND EUROPE FRANCE / BRUSSELS ! 
WE THE UNDERSIGNED BELIEVE IT'S UNSAFE TO HOLD A MAJOR INTERNATIONAL CUP FINAL ON THE MAINLAND AS THE BORDERLESS SENGEN AREA OFFERS FANS "NO" PROTECTION AGAINST ISLAMIST TERRORIST'S !

rejection.details: This is a decision for UEFA, not the UK Government or Parliament.
